scripts.images: for i in ./static/photos/*.jpg; do convert "$i" -quality 80% "${i%.jpg}.jpg"; done
scripts.build-jekyll: JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --destination dist --trace --config _config.yml,_config_prod.yml
scripts.js-compile: pnpm run js-compile-standalone && pnpm run js-compile-standalone-esm
scripts.watch: pnpm run watch-jekyll & pnpm run watch-js & pnpm run watch-browsersync
scripts.watch-jekyll: JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll build --watch --destination dist --config _config.yml
